doc.title: When Winnie the Pooh Was Very Very Young

credit.role: Herself - Creator of Book Of Pooh

doc.plot: An enchanting 16 minute documentary film featuring some stunning unseen footage, historical treasures, and the true story of the origins of the real Winnie The Pooh. The feature also includes interviews and behind the scenes secrets about the newest feature The Book of Pooh and its creator Mitchell Kriegman.
